meanings.definition: A person or thing that uses something.
meanings.sent1: The utilisers of the new technology were impressed by its efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The utilisers of the library books returned them on time.
meanings.sent3: The utilisers of the broken umbrella found creative ways to stay dry.
meanings.sent4: The utilisers of the old bridge were the only ones who knew its secrets.
meanings.sent5: The utilisers of the playground equipment laughed and played all day.

meanings.sent1: The utilisers of the paintbrush created a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The utilisers of the computer typed quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The utilisers of the remote control had a battle over the TV channels.
meanings.sent4: The utilisers of time as a resource understood its value.
meanings.sent5: The utilisers of the key unlocked the mystery box with excitement.
